text: There is the draft stage and the proof stage, before you publish the site to your domain. In the proof stage, you can test the dynamic pages.
Anyone ever set up dynamic pages with a parent/child relationship using foreign_id columns?
in this example, foreign id column is set in events table and i make another table for locations
and you also need to select  hubDb in page setting, i selected events table here
its like using a better version of multi select
Also the foreign row data is lazily loaded in HubL so you donâ€™t get too much of a performance hit for using foreign rows
Didnt know that but that is a great feature
